content.longDescription: This feast is big and burgerful. Stuffed with two Original Crispy Burgers, two Zinger® Burgers, 6 golden Nuggets, 1 Regular Popcorn Chicken®, 2 Large Chips and 1 Dipping Sauce, this feast is bound to go down a treat with everyone. Only in SA and not forever.

shortDescription.value: 4 pieces of Original Recipe®, 10 Nuggets, 4 Original Tenders™, 1 large Chips, 1 large Potato & Gravy and 2 Sweet and Sour sauces.

longDescription.value: Get so much bang for your buck and take the party up a notch with this Value Feast. With four pieces of Original Recipe® Chicken, ten Nuggets, four Original Tenders™, one large Chips, one large Potato & Gravy and one Aioli sauce and one Sweet & Sour sauce it smacks in all the right places. Not everywhere and not forever.

shortDescription.value: The legendary KFC Freeze is the daddy of frozen drinks. Grab a refreshing Mountain Dew Freeze and you're set. This offer is not everywhere and not forever. Mountain Dew Freeze contains Caffeine and is not recommended for children, pregnant or lactating women or individuals sensitive to caffeine.
